2 2021 ReadeRs’ choice awaRds The BRANDON SUN n Thursday FEBruary 25 2021 n Annual awards net record number of votes
By TyleR claRke This year’s Westman Readers’ Choice set a new record, netting a to- tal of 198,168 votes. “I’m not surprised,” Brandon Sun publisher Jim Mihaly said, adding the newspaper’s annual effort has sharp- ly grown in prominence during every one of its five years. From the inaugural 2017 event’s 8,788 votes to last year’s 94,937, West- man has been taking notice. The awards’ 100 categories have been switched up a great deal over the course of its five years to narrow in on what readers are most interest- ed in, Mihaly said, adding voters plug in their own answers rather than rely on pre-determined options, which keeps the effort firmly in the com- munity’s hands. Among the most popular competi- tions in each year’s event is the “Best Pizza Shop” category, for which Pizza Express has retained gold four years running. That was until now, with Fast Fired by Carbone bumping the longtime Brandon institution to second place. Fast Fired opened at Brandon’s Corral Centre in 2018 and is format- ted as a “build your own” pizza shop, where customers select toppings and watching staff build their pizza in front of them. Upon learning they placed in the top three alongside Pizza Express and Marino’s Pizza, owner Jayson McCallum said he was honoured to The crew at Fast Fired By Carbone prepare pizzas during a grand opening event at their Corral Centre location in 2018. (File) be included. “They’re some good people to be “Trustworthiness is a significant this year to make it a greater priority. We are humbled to be nominated by our community and know you have other great,
local options to choose from. Our hearts are full.
Thank you for making us your clubhouse, for thinking of us on your grocery run, for including us in your meal plans, for having us at your celebration table and for making the detour downtown each day for your coffee and treats.
As a measure of our gratitude, please bring this clipping by before March 10th, 2021 at 4:22pm for a cup of our French Roast coffee, on the house. No purchase required, just a smile behind a mask and the beautiful top half of your face. If you have a Because Local Coffee Card we’ll even upgrade you to a latte of your choice because that’s how we roll.
We’ll see you soon, but if we don’t, we hope to see you later.
